block.p: Alyssa Brunetto, a daughter of Eligia and Peter Brunetto of Buffalo, was married on Monday to Andrew Kelly Johnson, the son of Dr. James David Johnson of Oak Ridge, Tenn., and the late Elizabeth Kelly Johnson. The Rev. Peter K. Meehan performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Rosary Roman Catholic Church in New York.
The bride and bridegroom met at Syracuse University, from which they graduated cum laude and where the bridegroom received a master's degree in neuroscience.

Alyssa Brunetto, a daughter of Eligia and Peter Brunetto of Buffalo, was married on Monday to Andrew Kelly Johnson, the son of Dr. James David Johnson of Oak Ridge, Tenn., and the late Elizabeth Kelly Johnson. The Rev. Peter K. Meehan performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Rosary Roman Catholic Church in New York.

Alyssa Brunetto, a daughter of Eligia and Peter Brunetto of Buffalo, was married on Monday to Andrew Kelly Johnson, the son of Dr. James David Johnson of Oak Ridge, Tenn., and the late Elizabeth Kelly Johnson. The Rev. Peter K. Meehan performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Rosary Roman Catholic Church in New York.
The bride and bridegroom met at Syracuse University, from which they graduated cum laude and where the bridegroom received a master's degree in neuroscience.

Mrs. Johnson, 23, is an associate manager of fashion research and development for a merchandising unit at Macy's, a division of Federated Department Stores. Mr. Johnson, 24, is to start his third year of medical school at Columbia this month.
